import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Spinner from 'react-bootstrap/Spinner'; import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; import DropdownButton from 'react-bootstrap/DropdownButton' import ButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup' import ToggleButton from 'react-bootstrap/ToggleButton' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Select from 'react-select'; import { Navibar } from '../component/Navibar'; import { Clinvar } from '../component/Clinvar' import { api } from '../services/api.service'; import { clinvar } from '../services/clinvar.service'; import { userService } from '../services/user.service'; import { parse } from '../helpers/exomiser-parser'; import { Vep } from '../component/Vep'; class SamplePage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { user: {}, users: [], proband: {}, data: [], genes: [], showElem: [], reviewStatus: [], geneList: [] }; } componentDidMount() { this.setState({ user: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')), users: { loading: true }, proband: window.location.pathname.split(':')[1], isLoading: true, data: { loading: true }, genes: [], showElem: [], reviewStatus: [], geneList: [] }); api.getProbandById(window.location.pathname.split(':')[1]).then(data => { const { genes, raw } = parse(data); this.setState({ data: genes }) this.setState({ isLoading: false}) }) api.getGenes(window.location.pathname.split(':')[1]).then(data => { this.setState({ genes: data}) this.setState({ showElem: Array(data.length).fill(false) }) this.setState({ reviewStatus: Array(data.length).fill("Incomplete") }) }) } showGene(label, value) { let tempArr = Array(this.state.showElem.length).fill(false) tempArr[value] = true this.setState({ showElem: tempArr }) } updateReviewStatus(val, i) { let tempArr = this.state.reviewStatus tempArr[i] = val this.setState({ reviewStatus: tempArr }) } updateGeneList(value, i) { console.log(value) console.log(i) let tempArr = this.state.geneList tempArr[i] = { gene: "UNK", variant: `${value.chromosomeName}:${value.position}:${value.ref}:${value.alt}`, } this.setState({ geneList: tempArr }) } render() { const { proband, data, isLoading, genes, showElem, reviewStatus } = this.state; return (

Proband - {proband.toString()}
